div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1047 Kerch' (anc. Panticapaeum), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1907 Burial: 330-315 B.C. (Shelov) Contents: 10 AE. In burial Panticapaeum: AE (as BMC 24, 25) Disposition: museum material lost during war Shkorpil, IAK 35 (1910), pp. 17-18, no. 25
